description: This recipe fuses pesto and tapenade, with green herbs, garlic, olives and flaked almonds for a rich flavour and texture. Better yet, itâ€™s dairy-free.
keywords: Pesto,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Almond & Olive Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor combine almonds, olives, herbs, zest, garlic and oil. Process to a chunky paste. Season to taste. Transfer to a jar and cover in a thin layer of extra oil. Seal jar and refrigerate until ready to use.
